text: Hagi agra ko rama'a bulimakao afutamine, afovage bulimakao anentatamine, sipisipi afutaminena aheno kre sramana nevuno, maka kini ne'moka mofavreramine, pristi ne' Abiatane, sondia vahe'mofo ugagota kva ne' Joapunena zamagia hige'za anampina ne'zana ome nene'za musena nehaze. Hianagi eri'za neka'a Solomonina agia osu'ne.
